English (United States)(en-US): According to one Moon Cleaner, I was never meant to live.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 가벼이 스쳤던 어느 달 청소부의 말에 의하면, 난 분명 살아서는 안 됐었어.

English (United States)(en-US): A blob that ‘opened it’s eyes’ amid the foul, disturbing dream filth.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 악하고 징그러운 꿈들의 폐기물에서 ‘눈을 뜬’ 덩어리라니.

English (United States)(en-US): I was the sadness and pain they had buried deep, risen from the grave.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 난 그들이 힘껏 묻어 두었던 슬픔과 고통이, 마치 무덤을 파헤치고 되살아난 것만 같은 존재였던 거야.

English (United States)(en-US): Despite their efforts, Sir Cello, Edison, and not even Red could prevent my disposal.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 나를 편견 없이 바라봐 주던 첼로 경과 에디슨, 그리고 레드마저 나의 처분을 막을 수는 없는 듯했어.

English (United States)(en-US): Red raged, the tips of his flames shuddering and leaping,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 레드는 머리 끝자락의 불을 맹렬하게 휘날리며 분노했지만,

English (United States)(en-US): but his cries weren’t enough to justify my continued existence.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그의 분노조차 나의 생과 삶에 대한 당위성을 부여해 주지는 못했지.

English (United States)(en-US): Not a soul could prove I was harmless. No, most were strongly against my existence.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 누구 하나 ‘얘는 살아야 해. 해롭지 않아.’라고 확신할 수 없었고, 대부분의 이들은 강하게 거부했거든.

English (United States)(en-US): I told myself it was alright as I headed to the corner of the moon.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 괜찮아. 무서웠지만 그래도 괜찮아. 그저 본능적으로 달의 모서리로 향했어.

English (United States)(en-US): Awaiting my end, I hoped the sharp spikes of fear wouldn’t reach me here.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 사형 처분을 기다리게 될 이곳만큼은 불안으로부터 안전하기를. 날 선 공포가 침범하지 못하기를 바라며.

English (United States)(en-US): I could see the universe very well from my post.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그곳은 우주가 참 잘 보이는 곳이었어.

English (United States)(en-US): It’s a wonderful realm. Infinitely dark and vast.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 우주는 신기한 공간이야. 무한히 검고 드넓지

English (United States)(en-US): Makes you wonder. Could anything happen out there in the endless stretch of space?
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 저 끝없이 펼쳐지는 공간에선 무슨 일이든 일어날 수 있지 않을까? 막연히 상상하게 될 만큼.

English (United States)(en-US): And when the time came and they grabbed me by my body,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 얼마의 시간이 흘러 그들이 내 몸뚱아리를 붙잡았을 때

English (United States)(en-US): “Maybe someone out there wants me as a dream of their own.”
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): “저 밖엔 나를 꿈으로 삼아 줄 다른 존재가 있을지도 몰라.”

English (United States)(en-US): With those parting words to a universe that had shown me a glimmer of light, I closed my eyes.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 미약한 빛무리를 보여 주었던 우주에게 마지막 한 마디를 헌정하고, 눈을 꼭 감았어.

English (United States)(en-US): For the longest time nothing happened.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그리고는 한참이나 아무 일도 일어나지 않았던 거야.

English (United States)(en-US): When I opened my eyes again… they looked confused.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 눈을 떴을 땐 조금 혼란해진 그들의 표정이 보였어.
